tag_list: appbooker, apps, ios, android, blackberry, iphone, ipad, app-developer
overview:
Stuart is founder and CEO of AppBooker.com - a purpose built showcase of the world’s best mobile app developers.

The idea for AppBooker first came about in the spring of 2010 when Stuart’s efforts to identify the right app developer for his own idea relied seemingly on Google and who it listed highest. To make the process easier, Stuart formed a company, built a team and succesfully conceptualized, designed and realized a fully searchable website in AppBooker.com which allows users to filter out the right developer for their project based on price, platform and location.

Developers on AppBooker can showcase unlimited apps and bring them to life through videos, screenshots, demos and loads of supporting info, showing off key wins, their development process,Twitter feeds and LinkedIn profile information for all the world to see.
